//   ----------------------- ----- ----
//   UniformPixelVector_0    c0       1
//   ScreenPositionScaleBias c1       1

//   ScreenToLight           c7       4
//   UniformPixelVector_1    c11      1
//   UniformPixelVector_2    c12      1

//   LightFunctionParameters c15      1
//   SceneColorTexture       s0       1
//   NvStereoFixTexture      s1       1
//   PixelTexture2D_0        s2       1

//   PixelTexture2D_3        s5       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c4, 0.0625, 0, 9.99999975e-006, 100000
    def c5, 1.18941605, -0.5, 0.5, -9.99999997e-007
    def c6, 1.10000002, 0.0700000003, 10, 0.25
    def c16, 1.81212997, 0.00999999978, 0.0199999996, 1
    def c17, 0.333000004, 0, 0, 0
    dcl_texcoord v0.xyw
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2
    dcl_2d s3
    dcl_2d s4
    dcl_2d s5

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s15


// Unreal Engine stereo correction disabled by DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --stereo-sampler-ps=s15 --disable-redundant-unreal-correction --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --auto-fix-unreal-lights --auto-fix-unreal-dne-reflection --only-autofixed --quiet CRC32_C249F0DA_225.txt
def c3, 0, 0, 0, 0 // Overrides NvStereoEnabled passed from Unreal Engine

texldl r31, c220.z, s15
mov r5.xyw, v0
add r31.w, r5.w, -r31.y
mad r5.x, r31.w, r31.x, r5.x

    abs r0.x, c3.x
    if_ne c3.x, -c3.x
      texld r1, c4, s1
      add r0.y, -r1.y, r5.w
      mad r1.x, r1.x, r0.y, r5.x
      mov r1.yz, r5.xyww
    else
      mov r1.xyz, c4.y
    endif
    cmp r0.xyz, -r0.x, r5.xyww, r1
    rcp r0.z, r0.z
    mul r0.xy, r0.z, r0
    mad r0.xy, r0, c1, c1.wzzw
    mov r0.zw, c4.y
    texldl r0, r0, s0
    add r0.x, r0.w, -c2.y
    add r0.y, -r0.x, c4.z
    rcp r0.x, r0.x
    cmp r0.x, r0.y, c4.w, r0.x
    mul r0.x, r0.x, c2.x
    rcp r0.y, r5.w
    mul r0.yz, r0.y, r5.xxyw
    mul r0.yz, r0.x, r0
    mul r1.xyz, r0.z, c8.xyww

// Unreal Engine light fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --stereo-sampler-ps=s15 --disable-redundant-unreal-correction --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --auto-fix-unreal-lights --auto-fix-unreal-dne-reflection --only-autofixed --quiet CRC32_C249F0DA_225.txt
add r31.w, r0.x, -r31.y
mad r0.y, -r31.w, r31.x, r0.y

    mad r0.yzw, c7.xxyw, r0.y, r1.xxyz
    mad r0.xyz, c9.xyww, r0.x, r0.yzww
    add r0.xyz, r0, c10.xyww
    rcp r0.z, r0.z
    mul r1.xy, r0.z, r0
    mad r1.zw, r0.xyxy, r0.z, c11.xyxy
    mad r2.xy, r0, r0.z, c12
    texld_pp r2, r2, s3
    mov r3.xw, c16
    mad r1.xy, r1, r3.x, c12
    texld_pp r4, r1, s3
    mul r1.xy, r4, c16.y
    mad r1.xy, r2, c16.z, r1
    add r2.xy, r1, r1.zwzw
    texld r2, r2, s4
    add r0.w, -r2.x, c16.w
    mad r1.xy, r1.zwzw, c5.x, r1
    texld r1, r1, s4
    add r1.x, -r1.x, c16.w
    mad r0.xy, r0, r0.z, c5.y
    mov r1.y, c4.y
    dp2add r2.x, c13, r0, r1.y
    dp2add r2.y, c14, r0, r1.y
    add r0.xy, r2, c5.z
    texld r2, r0, s5
    add r0.x, r2_abs.x, c5.w
    mul r0.y, r2_abs.x, r2_abs.x
    add r0.z, -r0.w, r1.x
    mul r0.y, r0.z, r0.y
    cmp r0.x, r0.x, r0.y, c4.y
    add r0.x, r0.x, r0.w
    mul r0.y, r0.x, c6.x
    add r0.z, r0_abs.x, c5.w
    mul r0.w, r0_abs.x, r0_abs.x
    mul r0.w, r0.w, r0.w
    mul r0.w, r0.w, c5.z
    cmp r0.z, r0.z, r0.w, c4.y
    mad r0.x, r0.x, c6.y, r0.z
    add r0.z, r0_abs.y, c5.w
    pow r1.x, r0_abs.y, c6.z
    cmp r0.y, r0.z, r1.x, c4.y
    add r0.x, r0.y, r0.x
    texld r0, r0.x, s2
    add r0.x, r0.y, c6.w
    add_pp r0.xyz, r0.x, c0
    dp3 r0.w, r0, c17.x
    lrp_pp r1.xyz, c15.x, r0.w, r0
    add r0.xyz, r1, -c16.w
    mad_pp r0.xyz, c15.y, r0, r3.w
    rsq_pp r0.x, r0.x
    rsq_pp r0.y, r0.y
    rsq_pp r0.z, r0.z
    rcp_pp oC0.x, r0.x
    rcp_pp oC0.y, r0.y
    rcp_pp oC0.z, r0.z
    mov_pp oC0.w, c16.w

// approximately 87 instruction slots used (9 texture, 78 arithmetic)
